name: ResetPath
versionDescription: Initial release of ResetPath - Your companion in breaking free from porn and regaining control. Features include streak tracking, urge management tools, private journaling, and motivational content.
localizedDescription: ResetPath is a private, offline-first recovery app designed to help you break free from porn addiction using evidence-based psychology. Track your progress, manage urges with proven techniques, and build healthy habits - all while keeping your data completely private on your device.

permissions.usageDescription: Used for local data persistence and offline functionality
